select
from ManufacturerInfo
delete_flag=1
and (manufacturer_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or manufacturer_cn like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))

SELECT a.id,a.manufacturer_name,a.manufacturer_cn,a.delete_flag,concat( b.emp_name,'',b.emp_code) creator,a.create_time,concat( c.emp_name,'',c.emp_code) modifier,a.modifi_time FROM ManufacturerInfo a LEFT JOIN UserInfo b ON a.creator=b.emp_code LEFT JOIN UserInfo c ON a.modifier=c.emp_code ORDER BY a.delete_flag desc;
